metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35828 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.3.2. A use-after-freewas found in renesas_usb3_remove in drivers/usb/gadget/udc/renesas_usb3.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
